text_block_list.text:
On my day off, I decided to take a hike for 
a break from work and was wandering around 
a store when I bumped into a Hokko Tarumae.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Hiking for a break, sounds great!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text:
There are hiking trails for beginners, and it would be fun 
to gradually move on to larger mountains.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text:
(Ummm, is that too serious…… ? Ummm, nah, just 
my opinion. And the trainer doesn't look as 
troubled as they did at the time ……)
choice_data_list:
You know a lot about it. 
I'd like to know more if you don't mind.

You know a lot about it, don't you? 
I'd like to know more if you don't mind.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: ……! Uh, let's see… ……

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text:
(What should I do?…… If I say something weird again and make 
it less exciting, ……)

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text:
(But…… it's an opportunity for me to thank for their daily 
support.…… As long as I don't say anything insensitive―)
choice_data_list: Tarumae?

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text:
…… Oh, sorry, it's nothing! If you are 
okay with me, I'll show you around!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text:
First of all, you need to choose the right shoes! There are 
many different types of mountaineering shoes.

Hokko Tarumae seems to know quite a bit 
about mountaineering. At this point, I 
would like to ask and learn a lot.
choice_data_list: What about those big, strong shoes over here?

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text:
Oh, those are called high-cut shoes, and they're heavy 
mountaineering shoes……!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text:
…… Uh, good for climbing snowy or difficult mountains! If 
you're hiking, I also recommend this mid-cut ……!
choice_data_list: I see, I'll take that one then!
Okay, I'll take that one then!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text:
(Good thing…… I chose the right shoes! The mood isn't 
getting any worse, is it? Yeah, it looks fine ……)

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text:
Next up is to pick out some clothes! Well, are there any 
products you are interested in, Trainer?
choice_data_list: I'd love to hear Tarumae's recommendations.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: my recommendation…… um, yes……

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text:
(In terms of maintaining body temperature, dry innerwear is 
still essential. The more novice you are, the more you 
should focus on function over design, but ……)

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text:
(This is boring, isn't it? It would be more exciting to 
choose a stylish design that you like. ……)

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text:
How about this jacket? It's a new product from a popular 
brand, and I thought Trainer might like it!

I don't know if it's my imagination, but I feel that the 
recommendations she gives me are not like her. It's also 
strange that she seems to be looking at my faces.
In times like this―!
choice_data_list:
I'd be interested in a trench coat 
from that store over there too!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: What?…… Ehhh!? T… t… trench coat !?
choice_data_list: I'm just kidding―

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text:
―Oh, yes, I think it's great! It's fashionable…… let's take 
a look at that store over there!
choice_data_list: Tarumae! Wait, sorry, I'm just kidding ……!

text_block_list.text:
It was a comment intended to soften her up, but it was taken 
seriously. While I hurried to keep her back, I was still 
concerned about her attitude……

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text:
Let's see…… with all this, I think you can climb any 
beginner mountain……!

Thanks to Hokko Tarumae's choice, I have all the hiking gear 
I need. I would like to thank her in some way.

Besides, I think she's been acting a little strange since a 
while ago. Let's recover from our earlier mistake here.
choice_data_list: Tarumae, if you don't mind ……!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text:
―Whew…… the air is fresh…… The trails here are pretty well 
paved, so it's an easy walk.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text:
Ah! There, there's a wild bird's nest…… Hmmm. The little 
birds flying over there were chicks not too long ago.
choice_data_list: Are they practicing catching bait or something?

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text:
Maybe so! Hmmm, being able to slowly observe this kind of 
natural activity is one of the best parts of mountain 
climbing, isn't it?

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text:
I have climbed my local mountain…… many times 
like this. In mount Tarumae there is a bird 
called "Binzui" which is very cute.
choice_data_list: (It's the usual Tarumae…… I'm glad I invited her)

text_block_list.text:
Suddenly, I spotted a cluster of beautiful flowers growing 
along the side of the track. I reached out to show them to 
her, thinking that they might cheer her up even more―

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Ah― don't touch it!
choice_data_list: What?

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text:
The injuries―!…… seems to be fine, 
I guess. Thank goodness……

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text:
…… Some mountain plants are dangerous to touch. There are 
even poisonous insects.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text:
Of course, you can't just pick it and bring it home ……! From 
an ecosystem protection standpoint, It should never be done!
choice_data_list: I'm sorry! I was rash!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Ah―
choice_data_list: Thanks for letting me know, that was helpful―

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: I… I'm sorry! Um, I'm ……!
choice_data_list:
……You really helped me out. 
I think I'll just take a picture.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Oh…… yes, sorry…… Pictures, I think it's okay.

Hokko Tarumae smiles awkwardly. I took a picture of the 
cluster of flowers and moved on.

We arrived at the rest area. Before we knew it, the sun was 
beginning to set and the view from the hill was beautiful.
choice_data_list: Sunset, it's beautiful.
Sunset, it's beautiful.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text:
…… Ah, yes. I'm glad you liked it. It's the best part of 
hiking, isn't it? ……

Hokko Tarumae's expression was somewhat gloomy. I invited 
her with the intention of cheering her up……
choice_data_list: I'm sorry. I'm sorry I wore you out.
I'm sorry. I'm sorry I wore you out.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text:
Oh no, not at all! I'm just so happy to 
be enjoying my hobby with my trainer……!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text:
Rather… it's Trainer that, um…… was trying 
to enjoy the nature, but I ……

『I was trying to enjoy nature.』…… The only thing that comes 
to mind when she say that is―.
choice_data_list: About the flower earlier?

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text:
Yes……I'm sorry I was too hard on you, 
no matter how dangerous it is……

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text:
Besides, it's no fun to be told about 
ecosystems and…… such rigid things.

That's not true. She will warn you of dangerous 
thing and teach you the right knowledge - 
that's her compassion and kindness.
choice_data_list: I'm rather impressed, and I've even learned a lot.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Trainer………… ehehe, thank you.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text:
……After all, Trainer is very kind. You 
always take care of me like this.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: …… and yet I ……
choice_data_list: Tarumae?

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text:
Well, I'm hungry! Why don't we go down the mountain and eat 
something delicious?

Hokko Tarumae made the suggestion in a cheerful tone. 
However, her expression looked somewhat like a fake smile - 
a smile that was not quite right.
